text:
@realDonaldTrump Notice how the first & loudest cable TV voices calling for back to normal

Are those with the lowest risk of contracting the virus, best Healthcare, and millions/billions in stocks.

Their strategy to encourage workers to work against their own health is working.

#coronavirus
